diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+set -eu
+
+# mach wants this
+export SHELL=$(which bash)
+
+apt-get install -y npm curl python2.7 xvfb
+
+# Creates gecko-dev-master
+echo 'Downloading gecko-dev...'
+curl -sL https://github.com/mozilla/gecko-dev/archive/master.tar.gz | tar xz
body_text: We should file some followup bugs after this lands to see if we can use something like https://github.com/taskcluster/taskcluster-vcs (or a more recently-updated tool, if it exists) to speed up this download.
